title: News-Summarization-with-sentiment-Analysis
description: A web-based application that extracts key details from news articles related to a given company, performs sentiment analysis, conducts a comparative analysis, and generates a Hindi text-to-speech (TTS) output. The tool allows users to input a company name and receive a structured sentiment report along with an audio summary.

description: A React-based admin dashboard for managing users via the Reqres API. Supports viewing, searching, editing, deleting, and paginating user data, with integrated form validation and responsive UI design.

title: URL Shortener
description: A minimalistic URL shortener built using Django and the Bitly API, enabling quick generation of short, shareable links with an intuitive user interface.
